title: Filibuster Recipe
full_text:
Filibuster Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
rye whiskey
3/4
ounce
freshly squeezed lemon juice
from
1
whole
lemon
1/2
ounce
maple syrup
1
large
very fresh
egg white
Angostura bitters
Directions
Add rye, lemon, maple syrup, and egg white to a cocktail shaker. Dry shake (without ice) for 20 seconds to emulsify egg. Add ice and shake hard for 10 seconds, until chilled. Strain into coupe, garnish with Angostura bitters, serve immediately.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
